WorkItem.Summary: Warning Message on opening Zip file

Comments.Message:
With WinZip you can open the zip and click View | Comments to get a text box where you can put comments. This should then popup when you open the zip. I'm not sure if its a user option though as to whether to show the popup and I don't think it would show if the user simply did a "right click -> extract to here" type operation. However it is better than nothing. 

If you are using something like wzzip to create the zip in a batch file you can use the command

wzzip -C -z d:\temp\test.zip

to prompt for a comment.
